title: Optimize Rig Move
description: A logistics specialist plans the move of a drilling rig from one well pad to another, aiming to minimize time and cost.

tasks.description: Identify all the components of the rig that need to be moved and their weights/dimensions.
tasks.expected_outcome: A complete list of all rig loads is generated.

tasks.description: Plan the optimal sequence for disassembling, moving, and reassembling the rig components.
tasks.expected_outcome: A detailed rig move schedule is created.

tasks.description: Schedule the required trucks and cranes and obtain any necessary road permits for oversized loads.
tasks.expected_outcome: All third-party logistics and permits are secured for the planned move date.
